H3.text: who does tony end up with on skins. Michelle

A4.text: In the series finale, Effy is found in Tony's bed, revelling in the artwork of emotions she has created.

A5.text: In the finale episode, Tony confesses to Michelle that he loves her and wants to change his manipulative ways (whilst on the phone), only to be hit by a bus, as Effy watches on from Sid's dad Mark's car.
